questions.question: The BFSK spectrum is sum of
questions.explanation: Bandwidth of ASK is 2/Tb and for FSK is 4/Tb. Hence FSK is sum of two ASK spectra

questions.question: Which among the following consumes more bandwidth
questions.explanation: The Bandwidth for ASK and PSK is fb and for FSK is 2(∆f+f_b)

questions.question: Frequency shift keying is widely used in
questions.explanation: The telegraph system uses the concept of BFSK where the mark values are represented by unmodulated carrier frequency and the space values are represented by downward frequency shift. At the receiving end the demultiplexed signal is applied to standard phase discriminator

questions.question: Which type of FSK offers output with no discontinuity in phase?
questions.explanation: Continous FSK has no phase discontinuity between symbols

questions.question: In Coherent demodulation technique, FSK signal will be affected using which block?
questions.explanation: With coherent demodulation, carriers must be synchronous—the frequency must be reproduced exactly in the receiver. If this is not accomplished, the demodulated signal will be offset in frequency by the difference between transmit and receive carrier frequencies.
